void GrUTSysTileCache::Invalidate ( __int64  tileId  )  const

invalidates a tile in the cache. This causes a tile that's in the cache to be re-fetched.

unsigned int  dstX,
unsigned int  dstY,
__int64  tileId 
)

uploads a tile to the texture specified. Note that this function will wait for a tile to be fetched if it's not already in the cache.
